segments.text: do you have internet in your room ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: sure , I am a total internet junkie , I can't survive without internet .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: really ? What do you usually do online ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: well , there are a lot of things , like reading news , email , shopping , etc . but mostly I chat online . You could say I'm addicted to online chatting .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I never chatted online before . What's it like .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: well , basically it's similar to face-to-face chat , but you type instead of talk . You should try it at least once .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: really ? Who do you chat with ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: to people all over the world ! I have a lot of net pals . See , the magic of internet is that it connects people from all over the world . You can chat with someone thousands of miles away as if they were
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: that's amazing . I will install an online messenger program when I get home .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: well , my suggestion for a newbie like you is that don't get lost in the cyberspace . You know internet won't do the filtration for you , so you still need to use your judgement . There are a lot of per
segments.speaker: S2
